EmailTemplate.name: VHM Survey 2.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: First 25 Respondents Get $10 to Amazon: VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What Will You Buy with Your $10? <http://smile.amazon.com/s/field-keywords=gifts under %2410>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, You are receiving this email because you have download VMTurbo's free & unlimited Virtual Health Monitor at some point in the past 6 months.
The first 25 respondents to complete this Virtual Health Monitor Survey <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1-msW1aCoeKqdoTkyZvqHqJol9YF3OuVjyg3NX8PDqgY/viewform?usp=send_form> will receive a $10 Amazon Gift Card.
We're using ours to buy the banana phone.
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=}}. - Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
